introSection.text: Skilled software engineer proficient in different languages and frameworks. Experienced in full-stack development, adept at problem-solving, and dedicated to the art of crafting high-quality code.
introSection.subtitle: Software Engineer

uxDesigner.text: Acted as the lead UX designer in the elaboration of a cosmetic business's website, creating multiple page designs in Figma and conceptual designs in Photoshop, as well as having biweekly meetings with the project's stakeholders in order to gather feedback and discuss requirements.

fullStack.subtitle: Full-stack Developer Co-op
fullStack.text: Worked on prototyping and developing a MEAN stack application for a small team of individuals in order to speed up data gathering and visualization.

frontEnd1.subtitle: Front-end Developer Co-op
frontEnd1.text: Implemented, tested, reviewed, and shipped Angular components as part of the core front-end component library team within the company.

frontEnd2.subtitle: Front-end Developer Co-op
frontEnd2.text: Implemented, tested, reviewed, and shipped React components as part of the core front-end component library team within the company.

centennialCollege.subtitle: Computer Software Engineering, Canada
centennialCollege.text: Attained an Ontario College Advanced Diploma in Computer Software Engineering at Centennial College, mastering diverse programming languages and industry-level methodologies related to the creation of software at scale.

serverlessApiFormService.text: Created an api service, complete with its own front-end portal, which lets users programatically create/consume generic units of data called form items and business contacts.

contactSection.title: Contact
contactSection.text: Interested in any of my skills? Shoot me an email or a message on LinkedIn! I'm a very friendly guy, so coffee chats (even virtual ones) are more than welcome.
